cu.explanation_en: Changed T1a_up from [96,196] to [196,96] to simulate timing misalignment where the upper bound is less than the lower bound, causing logical contradiction in timing parameters.

du.explanation_en: Changed remote_n_address from "127.0.0.5" to "10.0.0.2" to simulate unreachable routing definitions, causing IP range conflict and DU inability to reach CU.
du.explanation_zh: 将 remote_n_address 从 "127.0.0.5" 更改为 "10.0.0.2" 以模拟不可达的路由定义，导致 IP 范围冲突和 DU 无法到达 CU。
